H0.text: British artist Sir James Thornhill (1675-1734), history painter and sergeant painter to George I and George II, was related by marriage to which other artist. William Kent

H1.text: British artist Sir James Thornhill (1675-1734), history painter and sergeant painter to George I and George II, was related by marriage to which other artist. Thomas Gainsborough

H2.text: British artist Sir James Thornhill (1675-1734), history painter and sergeant painter to George I and George II, was related by marriage to which other artist. Joshua Reynolds

H3.text: British artist Sir James Thornhill (1675-1734), history painter and sergeant painter to George I and George II, was related by marriage to which other artist. Hogarthian

A4.text: On 23 March 1729 he married Thornhill's daughter Jane.
